prompt: Generate a 1000 word story about an apocalyptic world where there is a very limited number of trees and food scarcity is burgeoning. People are trying hard to preserve what they have and work towards scientific breakthroughs that will generate resilient trees and new food sources. population is depleting rapidly and surface temperature is at 40 degree celsius. There are no more polar caps. Arid land is small but so is the population size.
title: Renewed Hope for Humanity
